title: Women's 500 m - Speed Skating Grenoble 1968 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Women's 500 m 1968","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":null,"9":"5.","10":"6.","11":"-","12":"8.","13":"9.","14":"-","15":"11.","16":"12.","17":"-","18":"14.","19":"15.","20":"16.","21":"-","22":"18.","23":"19.","24":"-","25":"21.","26":"22.","27":"23.","28":"24.","29":"25.","30":"26.","31":"27.","32":null,"33":null,"34":null,"35":"Women's 500 m - Speed Skating - Grenoble 1968 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Women's 500 m competition was held at the Anneau de Vitesse, Parc Paul Mistral and 28 athletes participated in the event.","36":null,"37":"These results for Women's 500 m - Grenoble 1968 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","38":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Women's 500 m 1968","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Lyudmila Titova","6":"Jennifer Fish","7":"Dianne Holum","8":"Mary Meyers","9":"Elisabeth van den Brom","10":"Kaija Mustonen","11":"Sigrid Sundby","12":"Kirsti Biermann","13":"Irina Yegorova","14":"Tatyana Sidorova","15":"Lisbeth Berg","16":"Evi Sappl","17":"Arja Kantola","18":"Christina Kaiser","19":"Christina Lindblom","20":"Wilhelmina Burgmeijer","21":"Ruth Schleiermacher","22":"Kaija-Liisa Keskivitikka","23":"Wendy Thompson","24":"Marie-Louise Perrenoud","25":"Hildegard Sellhuber","26":"Martine Ivangine","27":"Marcia Parsons","28":"Doreen McCannell","29":"Misae Takeda","30":"Ylva Hedlund","31":"Kaname Ide","32":"Sachiko Saito","33":null,"34":null,"35":"Women's 500 m - Speed Skating - Grenoble 1968 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes).
